dict.acceptation: 生产者，制造者；制片人；煤气发生炉；自养有机体；

sent.orig: It happens to be Africa's second biggest maize producer and a big wheat producer too.
sent.trans: 它恰巧也是非洲第二大玉米生产国及小麦生产大国，可首都亚的斯亚贝巴的粮食市场却又脏乱不堪。

sent.orig: Maine is a leading producer of potatoes or this microorganism is a producer of disease.
sent.trans: 植物是氧气的重要制造者。

sent.orig: Clint served as executive producer producer on the album.
sent.trans: 克林特担任该唱片的制作人。

sent.orig: THE legendary producer Jerry Bruckheimer likes to say that he can make a movie almost anything.
sent.trans: 传奇制作人杰里-布鲁克海默总说“他可以将任何事情拍成电影”。

sent.orig: SW: What does your role as executive producer entail?
sent.trans: 作为执行制片人，你所承担的职责是什么？
